content: knitted drops hat with spiral pattern in alaska drops extra 0-1020 drops design pattern no x-032-bn yarn group c size 1/2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 7/9 - 10/12 years head circumference 49 - 51 - 52 - 53 - 54 cm / 19\ -20\ -20½\ -21\ -21 1/4\ materials drops alaska from garnstudio 100-100-100-100-100 color no 58 mustard and use some left-over 02 off white for pompom drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16\ \ size 4 5 mm / us 7 - or size needed to get 18 sts x 23 row in stockinette st = 4\ \ x 4\ \ 10 x 10 cm
